duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing technical and managerial leadership to engineers and managers in multiple locations across the United States.
Directing program staffing by allocating resources across multiple departments.
Recruiting and hiring high-quality technical talent in the fields of cybersecurity, cloud computing, embedded systems, and software development.
Ensuring the quality of technical products and deliverables.
Actively performing information technology (IT) research and development.
Providing leadership on the future direction of IT for customers.
Analyzing ground, cloud, embedded, and space systems for cyber vulnerabilities and recommending solutions.
Leading the development of cutting-edge prototypes in both ground and spacecraft systems.
Developing and mentoring Managers and Directors within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, electrical engineering, computer engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
